name: Punit Gupta
title: Stopped Working ( R bud )
content: It has stopped working in a month.. Can someone please help me in claiming its warranty?. The process of warranty is very slow. Boat is not committed towards its customer.. Timeliness provided by company for repairing product exceeded the reality by far.

name: Pranav Tuli
title: Good for music, poor for calling
content: The sound quality while listening music and movies as well is quite good considering the price. Bass is decent and fitting and build up quality is good as well. But facing issues in using for call, as long as there is complete silence around you your voice will be heard nicely to other person. But if you are outside , calls will not work properly.

name: Rohit Acharya
title: Impeccable
content: I just brought two days back fast delivery by amazon.... About sound quality just impeccable crystal clear and bass is really deep with better vibration and frequency. Call quality is good not great. Charge backup is also good but it charge faster in case and i can say at this price range it is value for money go for it. Looks good premium and one hand use ...must buy

name: Sandesh pitambare
title: One earbud is not working.
content: Worst product,. I've purchased it because of sale, but sadly when I received product, one earbud is already not working.. Also the size of earbud is very large, doesn't fit very well in ears and that's why one can't use them for very long time just like regular earphones.. There is also connectivity issue with faulty earbud.

name: vJ
title: Don't waste your money
content: Replaced the product due to sound quality issues in one earbud. After 1 month usage facing the same issue on the new pair as well. Battery charge is draining fast not even getting 10 hrs on full charge (including box).

name: Rahul
title: Boat Airdopes
content: Noise cancellation should be improved while doing voice calling thatbis average while travelling call quality not good due to lack in noise cancellation of the outside noise otherwise in the price sound quality is very good and the bass too

name: Aquil Fahed
title: Good product
content: Product is very good i am writing this review after using 15 days full value of money nice buy, sounds quality super battery good bass quality also good i have only 1 issue with this product is after long time using my ears get some pain otherwise product is very nice product cost 2499/- but i get it just 1750/- with festive scheme

name: Lipsa
title: Very bad experience
content: The packaging is soooooo dull..they sent me the open hand box ..which one before open ..not sure the airdops will work or not ..but now let's see..because ..when I bought it first tym ... it's not working ....not properly connect with phone ...ane I can't listen the music..and. I replaced it with the same product..and the box is looks like using ....very bad experience ..

name: NISHANT SINGH
title: Good sound Quality, worst noise cancellation
content: Sound Quality for listening to songs and watching videos is awesome. The design feels a little odd in ears. Easily Comes out of ears so be cautious otherwise you will loose them easily. Not recommended for calling over phone....i have experienced worst worst noise cancellation while speaking over calls.

name: Manoj Desetti
title: Nice product which need some further technicalimprovements
content: Product is nice but when I place these pods in the case it doesn't take the exact position means they will start charging from the case but I have to keep them again correctly in that position.Sound is Good ,

name: Nitesh kumar Vijay
title: Best earbuds.
content: Everything is best in quality sensor are working very well. Sound is great.. But the only problem after 1/2 hour of use its wings started giving pain to ears.

name: Hrithik
title: Poor customer service and false advertising
content: The product was nice and served the purpose in the beginning. But within a period of 2 months, one of the ear buds became unserviceable. Tried to contact the customer service with no joy(as they were always busy with other calls even after staying on hold for a ridiculous half an hour!!). They offer product warranty for 1year but its juat a hoax.

name: Chaman Pandey
title: Awesome everything !!!
content: I would say if you want wireless bluetooth earbud headphones for music or meetings in 2500/- to 3000/- budget then buy it with CLOSED EYES, without any further research. You can't get matched quality in this range with any other brand.... Awesome sound, awesome bass, awesome clarity, awesome battery, awsesom features.... Everything awsesom !!!!! :-)

name: Amazon Customer
title: Left ear irritating sounds and no refund
content: The worst product ever. I had asked for a replacement but still the other product also had the same issue so I asked for refund so the guy took the product almost 2 months ago and I have not got my money back.. Plz buy this product on ur own risk u won't get your money back is u ask for a refund

name: NILESH PANDEY
title: Impressed by the product
content: According to the price its something that won't disappoint you comparing with other. Sound quality is really nice ..I am quite impressed with the bass quality considering the price range, also build quality is really nice and it's really comfortable to use. I would not say it's something extraordinary but........if your budget is low and you want something satisfying..this is your kick.

name: Manula P.J
title: Superb
content: Amazing product if u hear DJ songs then u will just love it much more than anything and it's quality is too good even though it does not give a premium look it's touch is also amazing u too just take a try in this thing. it is bettr

name: Jignesh Sakariya
title: Cheap Chinese material. Stopped working within 3 months
content: Boat is not reliable. I have bad experience with 2 product. Wired earphone stopped working after 10 months of use. I purchased this Air dopes 441 and within 3 months 1 side stopped working. Don't buy. Its just cheap Chinese material.

name: Neethu Kumar
title: Do not pick this up from Amazon.
content: Please do not purchase this, especially from Amazon. I received the product today morning and by afternoon the left ones stopped working. Absolutely no response. Its not even charging.. Go to the official boAt website. Do not purchase it from Amazon!

name: Roshan Singh
title: Super uncomfortable earbuds
content: There's always a cracking noise in the background when no audio is played.. Output very light and inadequate.. The earbuds are super uncomfortable.. Once purchased cannot be returned.. This product is not even worth 1 star.

name: Biswajit Mondal
title: Not for calling but good for listening
content: Sound quality is very good. Bass quality is superb. I took this earbuds mainly for phone calling but while calling I had to be louder, so receiver end person can hear properly and I had to return this. So my suggestion, if you want a earbud for calling, don't go for it but if you want to music purpose only, you should go for it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Ok product
content: The product need to mature a lot. Sound quality is ok and the noise cancellation is good. Coming to speaker not that stable at times it clear sometimes volume fluctuations is observed.. Power for airdodes dosent last long near to an hour and case not quite tested.

name: Vaishnavi R.
title: Not at all upto the mark
content: The product is fine, but it lacks the basic functionality that even a wired earphones have, you can't play two media at the same time, this becones worse because we need to use it for online classes and we can't hear the media that's being played because you can only hear the call at one time.

name: ayesha.sana
title: Defective/Damged at delivery
content: I got the boat airdopes 441 pro. Worst thing ever happened, the boat packaging was not good, it was taped on the sides and was clearly seen that it's an used or damaged or renewed product. The extra buds packaging was already torn and the guides were in dust. The earbud box and the left earbud had scratches all over. Unbelievable this condition from amazon.

name: Kiran
title: Good ear buds. You can buy in budget
content: 1. Good sound quality.. 2. Passive noice cancellation. You can't hear out side noise. Not recommended while while vehicle use or while walking.. 3. During call, receiving party complaining of to much background noise.. 4. Good bass quality.. 5. Pain in and around ear in prolonged usage.. Rest all a good product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Lot of Connection Issues
content: Sent this product for repair 2 times in the first 4 months after buying. After 1 month of operation, one of the buds stopped working. After it came from repair, with 15 days mic stopped working. Apart from this frequent disconnection from mobile and people are unable to hear properly on the other end.. Don't waste money on buying these.

name: anoop kumar
title: I can't use them while on video call
content: The airdopes are amazing but every time I use them for video calling my screen shows poor connection video paused, whenever I disconnect them and use my regular earphones the wired ones I can see the video again. I tried the factory reset and everything but this issue remains unresolved ðŸ¤·

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst product and not geting replacement
content: One side stop woking in just 1 month and they have taken the product for replacemnt or reaping but i am not genting any update from there side . When i chk on internet there are more than 100 people wating form past 6 to 7 months to get a replacement i think its a big scam by boat company

name: Rahul Jacob
title: Avg pods with amazing battery
content: Works well with mobile. Have lots of issues connecting to Google meet when paired with a laptop. Rearly connects to gmeet. Great battery backup though. Easily lasts 2 days for me.

name: Pika
title: Overall it is a very good product
content: Calling quality is very good. The sound quality is also very good. The packaging was very good. It connects very quickly whenever Bluetooth of my device is turned on or when I open the lid of the box

name: MOHIT K.
title: Pathetic Product. Donâ€™t buy
content: Itâ€™s been only one month now and I have hardly used it, I am facing connectivity issue. Itâ€™s very difficult to listen even one song, device gets disconnected and connected multiple times within a minute. Pathetic product. Someone please help me to resolve the issue.

name: Amazon Customer
title: I want to return this product . Not fit for me.
content: I wanted to return this product from the date i received. But i was given a single day . That too after 5 days . And on that day i forgot . Now i am stuckup with this product ..... ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ forci g to select atleast 1 star

name: Lochan Saxena
title: Go for it!
content: Very awesome sound quality and bass is so great i didn't expect in this price range..thankyou Amazon for fast delivery as always.ðŸ˜ƒkeep it up!

name: Keshav
title: Entertainment and music good but gaming not good.
content: Good for entertainment and music. Not good for gaming. Latency is not correct for gaming. There is a delay in audio and video they don't sync while gaming. All the other aspects are good.

name: APURB HAWLADER
title: boAt Fan Always....
content: .... ALWAYS BEING A BOAT FAN...... Just go for it.... Don't think much....... BASS: superb... in its best..... BATTERY: really good.... Case being a power bank itself is a best thing I found. LOOK: premium really.....and it's lights make it extra premium. SOUND: awesome. ...

name: Sindhu's
title: Worth for the price paid.
content: Battery life is excellent, sound quality is good too ..but the bass quality is not as expected. Once my left earbuds didn't work so I performed the factory reset and it's working now. During calls sometimes voice might crack. Overall it's good to use , doesn't give much of a disturbance .. It's just been a week since I used it and this is what I experienced.

name: Sindhu
title: Fair one
content: It falls off. And thatâ€™s worrying me. I canâ€™t ask you to choose this. But itâ€™s good for call and songs. Battery life is good. No noise cancellation. Thatâ€™s disappointing.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Do not buy this please.
content: Honest review :. If you are someone looking for an earbud just for the bass, then buy this one. The bass totally overshadows the music and you can't listen to it. After a point, you devolop headache.. The fit is adequate, feeling a bit tight in the ear after some time of use.. Overall, not worth 2.5k .

name: Kris k
title: Best in this price range
content: Earlier i bought jbl earbuds , I wasn't happy with bass quality but these boat earbuds is just awesome .. Basshead will defiantly like this .. No problem in running / excercise , fit perfectly in ears.. Sound -4.5/5. Bass- 4.5/5. Build quality - 4/5. Light Weight -5/5. Connectivity -5/5

name: Ashwin Kumar
title: Nice and comfortable set of headphones
content: The headphones are nice and comfy and the sound quality is nice and it is comfortable for wearing and music quality the best thing about this headphones is that it is nice and they don't destroy the music quality by adding too much bass or being too loud which is common in this cost range I find this as quite good buy and am happy with it

name: Neshant Verma
title: Waste of money
content: I will rate Amazon for fast delivery but this product is absolutely bad.... I got a sealed pack product and when I took it out of the box it was non functional. The right ear bud was not properly working. Got it replaced but the replacement product had an issue of BT connectivity. I will suggest not to waste money this boat airpods 441 model.

name: Dhavan Gadiwala
title: The box is damaged and Opened
content: When it arrives I saw there was no seal on the product , product was open,also there is no charging cable inside the box,also there is scratch on the product also on one earbud,I didn't expect this I am very Dissatisfied.

name: Saroj
title: Doesn't work with my laptop
content: This device is good for using with mobile phone but totally useless for laptop use. When I use it to make calls using laptop, the other party cannot hear the voice. I also got it replaced with same device but the issue still persists. Tried with other laptops too. :(

name: Sagar sarkar
title: 101% honest review.....
content: The best out there....the price has been dropped down to 2K frm 2.5K...... the sound is better than ny friggin' headset.....the bass is just the perfect amount....and the no issue in connectivity....moreover if anything happens to it....you have a 1 year warranty to replace it.....its the best

name: Dipanjan
title: Absolutely Ridiculous Product
content: Never expected such poor quality. The airdopes stopped taking charge after 4 month's of use. The right one is permanently not working. My 2500 rs went down the drain.

name: Aayush Roy
title: Its absolutely a value for money product.
content: Its been a month i am using this airbuds, and its working fine, battery life is also good, for normal use it goes more than 2 days for me with charging case. Calling quality is also decent but i have not seen any active noise cancellation in this airbuds in market area its very difficult to attend a call wiyh this airbuds elsewhere its fine.

name: Sanjay goel
title: Worst service by AMAZON
content: Product recieved on 22nd october 2020, packing box was not damaged but product quality is not good..and airpod is not comfortable in wearing ,didn't get set in ears..every time it get fall from my ears so i asked from amazon to return it but they refuse for yhe same ....in this case behaviour of amzon is not good so DONT PURCHASE THIS FROM AMAZON

name: Amazon Customer
title: Only music lovers
content: Its not upto quality as mentioned. Only good for music. Worst for call and games.

name: Nibin
title: Boat Airdopes is Dope!!
content: The overall sound quality of the earbuds is good. But I felt that the bass is lil bit on the lower side, it doesn't mean the bass level is bad, it's just low. Also I felt that they could have improved upon the battery backup of the earbuds. Other than that the earbuds is great for the price paid.

name: Prateek Verma
title: Good product
content: I bought it 10 days back and I am happy with it.. Pros: IWP works perfectly. Good finish. Good fit in ear.. Cons:. - range is quite less. It gets weak after reaching around 5+ meters.. - I have to recharge the case every alternate day. So may be they can boost the battery backup more. Although I only use for calling purpose and less for music so far.

name: Devender
title: Worst
content: Really worst services from boat, After one month I got problem one of earbud I requested for repair. They picked up. But still 3 after month I didn't get back my Ear buds from boat. I was trying to call them but no one picked up my call . I mailed but no reply . Fake products fake service please do not buy this product

name: vikram shukla
title: Good product
content: Again made in china. That's why giving them 3 star. However, a good buy at the comparative price I bought and the quality it offers w.r.t it's competitors.

name: NupurJ
title: Disappointed allot with the  connectivity. The sound quality is to upto the mark though
content: The sound quality is up to the mark the only major drawback that I'm facing us that it's getting disconnected automatically, even though on my phone it's showing connected the sound comes from the mobile speaker instead of the headset, I have to again disconnect them and connect it again major disappointment regarding the connectivity

name: Namit Sharma
title: Don't Purchase
content: It is not a good product where you can invest your 2000 rs. I am telling you this after using it for 2 months. There are lot of other better earbuds at lesser price, don't go by brand or any YouTube video because I did the same. Money is yours, so choice is yours.

name: Dhiren Dash
title: Not good for laptop
content: It is not good for laptop. Other person would not be able to hear if you call anyone from laptop. Works good with phone. Battery back up pretty good. If you want an earphone for office purpose, please do not buy.

name: Shivo
title: Consistency in creating mediocre products.
content: I would like to express my sincerest disappointment with the Indian brand Boat for sending me two really mediocre quality products which did not work. As you can see for yourself the right airdope does not work.. Apparently I ordered the replacement which adhered to the quality of "not working". This consistency is commendable. Bravo.

name: bishu
title: Cost-effective airdopes
content: Amazing sound quality. In a very good price.. Just love th bass in it and the sound quality.. Best airdopes I have ever seen. Thank you for reading my review

name: Nitesh
title: Very good product from BoAt. Must buy.
content: Sound quality very good. Battery backup very good. Build quality very good. Nice case. Comfortable rubber. Compact design and case. Easy to charge.

name: padmalli
title: Wrost product don't buy
content: Wrost product wrost sound quality

name: Navneet Kumar
title: 3rd grade product
content: Worst product ever. 1st one stopped working in return period so ordered a replacement. 2nd stopped working after return period so stuck with this piece of crap. 2000 down the drain.

name: mohit
title: Low battery but worth the buy
content: All in all its ok, need to be a bit careful as the touch is toooooooo sensitive and sometimes annoying. My only concern is 3 hour playback, which it says is t hours.

name: sumit
title: Average..Not so easy on ears...poor fitting
content: Does pain in the ears after wearing for more thn 30 mins. Falls off if not pressed deep in to ears. Fitting isn't too comfortable. Avoid if possible. Music and voice clarity is ok..but if possible go for some other product in the same or slightly higher price. Reviewing after 1.5 months of use. Overall 2.5/5.

name: Lakshay kumar
title: Best for itâ€™s price ðŸ”¥
content: Only one star left just because of comfort. But the TWS is dope AF for it's price 1999rs. Donâ€™t buy for 2499 or above it is best for 2k in my opinion just buy and if u donâ€™t like it just return it.

name: User
title: Bad experience
content: 1)Broken seal.. sellotape found instead of original seal.. going to return it.. seller from thane,is fraud... 2)got replacement.. bad product.. irritating sound hear in background.. returned

name: Jatin
title: DO NOT BUY. IT IS JUNK. CONSTANT DISTURBANCE IN 2 WEEKS.
content: Absolutely worthless.! Worked alright for a while. Crazy interference with wifi during whatsapp video calls. And now broken voice and echo in the sound. constant disturbance. I AM STUCK WITH THIS JUNK

name: georgy
title: left side ear bud stopped working and heating issues after 3 days of usage.
content: My left side ear bud stopped working and heating issues after 3 days of usage.. and when we use both earbuds for calling only one side mic is working... When we use individually both are ok, may be same fo all. Sound quality is good for bass lovers.. anyway returned and waiting for refund/replacement.

name: Yoga
title: Right side headset not working.
content: Hi Amazon Team,. I've used first day, it's worked properly and good also, once charged and putted on ear,right side airdrop is not working, it's only blinking red light. So again I charged one more time ,but it's not working, I don't know why?. Could help me what do for this case?. Let me know, if you have any concerns.. Regards. Yoga

name: kunal singh
title: Superb bass..awesome..
content: Best of best bass ... Its like i was searching for this sound from last 10yrs..bought many bluetooth headphone which includea jbl as well. But sound of this is just awesome. My search ends here.. thanks boat u created this marvel device.. super valur for money..dont think jus buy before stock ends.

name: Musavir
title: Crackling Noise From Right EarbudðŸ˜­
content: In my case the noise comes from Right Earbud When you change music or Volume ,The sound gets worse at high volume level. Dont buy Please Trust me ,After receiveing it You will Regret

name: Pankaj
title: Stopped working within a month
content: I purchased this product which stopped working after 1 month and when I sent it for repair/replace under 1 yr warranty then they sent me back an old scratched refurbished piece which i don't know how many people have already used.. Pl stay away from buying this product.

name: Abhishek
title: Sound average. Connection very poor and battery life is pathetic.
content: Very bad quality headset Bluetooth range very less gets disconnected very easily and charge gets drained for right earpiece faster and does not last more that 2 hrs. It could be for my earphone but I tried replacing and the replacement piece had the same issue.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very bad product.
content: Do not buy the product. I purchased it in Oct 2020 and twice it has malfunctioned even after the replacement from the company. It's cheap and durability is worst then Chinese products.. Now I believe that always buy genuine and good products and not to fall for heavy discounts and cheap products like Boat

name: Gauti
title: Unsatisfied
content: I m not satisfied with the product bcoz I have ordered 1st time and received on time but after 3 days of using its suddenly got stopped working so raised a refund and replace but another one that I received as replacement it's left earbud was not working so After checked raised return and refund on same day

name: MADHAV
title: Sound quality
content: Noise cancelling is zero bass is too punchy that's good quality for those who love bass and sound quality is average and also fitting issue who has small ear there is chance of falling from ear.

name: Sudharshan
title: Go in ! If you want to buy it for music ! Not calls !
content: It has its issues.. like microphone instability at times & disconnections at times... But as far as music & sound quality is concerned.. it is bang on ! And gives tough competition to well known established brands !. "Buy it for listening to music, you won't be disappointed ". I am impressed with the sound quality for sure !

name: Amazon Customer
title: I think it's worth under 2K
content: A good product. I have been using it since 1 week. The bass is good.. Don't go for the Negative Comments I have researched every earbuds available at this price so you can go for it. Latency is also Low!

name: Harsh garud
title: Worth of it's price
content: The product was really awsome and the sound quality was too good at this price but little bit issue of battery as per my side because in watching web series and all for 5-6 hours this will not helpful so boat can make a change to give battery backup of 7-8 hrs at least . But at the end I will say that product is worth of it's price. â¤ðŸ”¥

name: hitesh yadav
title: Terrible customer service experience
content: Customer service of boat is terrible. I am writting this after tolerating 2 month of bad customer service experience. In case your product damage then they give you product which is available at service center irrespective of colour of your product. And that is not guaranteed that replaced product delivered to you is worling or not.

name: Rashi Kumar
title: Keeps disconnecting
content: It's been almost 15 days I'm using this. The sound quality is fine but connection is an issue. One of them disconnects automatically when you're working out or just moving around within the range of bluetooth. Atleast they don't fall off. The sound quality is just fine. You can not adjust the volume with the headphones.

name: nitesh
title: Dissatisfied
content: Ordered it and waited eagerly only to be disappointed.. there's some humming noise or disturbance in one side. Only refund option no exchange.

name: Neeraj Noor
title: Waste of money
content: Do not buy this guys because i had to replaced this product in just a week because one side of Bluetooth stops working while playing music. Moreover sometimes donâ€™t connect each pair. Once again refunded product has also occurred same problem i.e right sides ear bud has stopped working and not pairing from the device. Such an act of waste of money

name: MILAN
title: Value for Money
content: The sound quality is great. Listen to the beat with clarity. Keep them in-ear for a longer duration with comfort. Both water and sweat resistant. The monopod feature is available.. Full charging takes 1.5 hrs. Must buy if you are looking for a budget under Rs. 2000 and reliable product.

name: Supriya Verma
title: Great fit for ears & amazing sound quality
content: It's the best air dope with such amazing sound quality. It's totally built for workouts. I can run, jump, lift weights without any worry of dropping them. It fits really well into the ears. 4+ hours battery life once out of the box.

name: Dr. Kajal jain
title: Right earpode isn't working
content: Bakwas. I have ordered it wid lots of hope but it is disgusting. Rt one is not working properly. After 2-3 min it gets discharge & evn though its not showing charging. Bttr i'l switch to some other brands

name: Shubham Nayak
title: Short review compare lot.
content: Sound quality is Amazingly good and comfort is also nice ......i compare a lots of boat airdops and this one is THE ONE.If you want a nice comfortable and budget friendly earbuds then Go for it without thinking anything. I got it for 1999 in sale but if you got them in under 2499 at any amount it worth.

name: Aziz Malkani.
title: Impressive sound and microphone quality.
content: This product is amazing and value for money. It's Sound and microphone quality is very good. I have been using BOAT products for quite a time now , and BOAT has never failed to impress me. I have used BOAT ROCKERZ 400 , BOAT ROCKERZ 255 , BOAT STONE 190 , BOAT TYPE-C CHARGING CABLE , and now this one BOAT AIRDOPES 441. All the products which i have used uptil now were awesome.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Affordable but too many tradeoffs
content: Full marks for their "IWP Technology" (Insta wake and pair) but the connection isn't stable AT ALL; one of the buds keeps switching off, needs to be reset.. Don't buy if you are planning to use it with laptops (or Apple devices in general).. Sound quality is above average, given the price.. Overall, it's Just another bad attempt at making TWS.

name: Kyra
title: Poor fitting
content: Sound is fine but the only problem is that it is not properly fitting in ears and it will keep on falling repeatedly so you will have to hold or adjust repeatedly.

name: Suhani
title: Poor Bluetooth connection
content: This piece I had gifted to my friend. She faced a lot of issues. The Bluetooth connection keeps on breaking in between calls. Had to struggle a lot to get it exchanged in company.

name: Venky
title: Budget airpods.
content: Bought these under sale for 2k. Sound quality is decent. Build quality is plastic and ordinary. Doubt how long would these last. Connectivity was easy. For the budget felt these were okay. While we have other better options, gor for these if you are on a tight budget.

name: Pinaak Desai
title: WORTH THE BUY , BEST IN ITS RANGE.
content: I got this for my son and he is a big music head. The sound quality is Prestine , the bass is way to good , just need to do some tweaks using the Equalizer which is inbuilt in the phone and you are good to go.. Perfect fit , doesn't even feel heavy in the ear and doesn't cause itching or any pain. Good overall build quality and proper stability over calls as well.

name: Anitha Karthik
title: Awesome quality
content: overall performance and the quality of the product is really awesome and people can promote this type of products in market instead of wasting money in other brand like Boss, JBL & Sony which has a same quality

name: Venkat Kadimisetti
title: PoorCharging
content: The charging is drained very fast, other than that the sound quality and connectivity is pretty decent.

name: nabin chandra guchhait
title: Honest Review.
content: Bought it on 18/10/20.(review date too)..Had ordered it yesterday. Bought it at 2k. The sound is clear and good ..i found the bass great .. The touch control is also great..u can feel the base at 70 80 vol. light weight so its best for fitness freaks like me ..also it doesn't pains even wearing fr a long time.. Go fr it..i ll update once used fr a month..

name: hari krishnan thampi
title: Airpod from boat
content: Sound quality was good mostly I liked the way it suited my ears after hours of long hearing it was not aching my ears but not satisfied with google assistant since it was not working battery backup was good tried by watching a movie 2hr long and sound quality was good disliked only for google assistant rest was good altogether..

name: Renji Chacko Mathew
title: Waste of money
content: Not a worth product to buy, Its just 5months I have bought this product, now I m not able to answer any phones or talk, only use is that I can hear songs or watch movies, and sometimes one side of the ear piece stops working suddenly and have to adjust with one ear piece, it's just waste of money 2.5k for just 5-6months

name: Spwandan Kumar Laha
title: East to West Amazon is the best
content: The left ear piece is defective. Like loosing connections by a single motion of body. How could we think to Walk Jog and Run. Therefore I'll return it. Thanks to Amazon to give me the refund in the very next day.

name: Arunavo R.
title: Good enough at this price point.
content: The earphones are good enough at this price point.. One can definitely go for these as a mid-range wireless earphones... Connectivity is also quite fast.. 3-5 sec is enough for the earphones to get connected with your device.. Bass is very impressive.. Sound quality is also fine.. Noise canceling is also very good.. I will definitely recommend it as a budget earphones.

name: Ahmed Raza
title: excellent product but i have got defective piece.
content: i have received the product but there is one defect that left earbud is not working properly and right one is working excellent , so i have requested for replacement now please provide me new and seal pack box so that i can get both eardbuds in fine condition.

name: SA
title: Terrible call quality and extremely bad customer service service

name: Smit
title: 3 out of 5
content: Cons. -connection drop issue while call when paired with Bluetooth V 5.1 (1+ Nord). - battery of earbuds lasts for 3 hours only if u listen music continuously. - volume can not be control by earbuds. Pros. - great sound. - easy fit in ears & good design. - comparitively cheap

name: sumanth
title: not worth
content: not great. dont waste money

name: Saurav
title: Nice product and i suggest to buy in â‚¹1999
content: The product is quite adequate but there is a unusual sound in right airdope ,for a few second , when i stop music and its also noticeable on low volume . I don't know why that sound coming but its is there.The performance time of each earbud is 3 hours .. Over all product is performing very well. And i suggest to buy it in â‚¹1999 .

name: Transparency
title: Two Months Review!!
content: The product was working fine according to its specifications. But, now I having started facing issues of decrease in battery life of both the case and the EarPods after complete charging. Also, the major drawback of the product is that during a call the person on the other side can not hear you properly because the mic is comparatively away.

name: Amazon Customer
title: superb
content: i bought it in 1800 and i loved it .. it has been 3 months .. it is great ... sound quality - good , battery - u can use 3-4 days regularly after full charging. noise cancelation - not like wired earphones but u can manage, bass- medium. color- i ordered mint and it is wonderful.

name: Dresthi Paliwal
title: Poor product quality
content: This is a very bad product. It works properly for sometime and after all of a sudden you can't hear tue sound. The product quality is very poor in terms of manufacturing, and this is my 3 earphone and airpod from boat and every single time I was disappointed by the company with their products. I would suggest not to go for this product ever.

name: Yaseen
title: The worst product and also service
content: Worst product , plzz don't waste ur money on this product , for first 20 days it was working properly and then suddenly the sound of left earbud got reduced and it finally stopped working , when i replaced it under warranty the same problem occurred now the touch is not working, I replaced it for 2 times , I really wasted my money

name: Deenakumar Gk
title: Poor Noise Cancellation
content: Phones are good and nice sound quality and fits in ears. Absolute no if you are looking for a noise cancelling earbuds; which makes it useless. Pretty costly for a music only earbud :(

name: Ambuj
title: Won't recommend
content: The sound quality is pretty decent. The issue is that it is an absolutely waste of money if your use case involves phone calls. The other person hears weird voices making it useless. Other thing is that the pair often goes out of sync and is then very irritating to get them in sync again. It has been a month and I rarely use it now.

name: Sanju Gorai
title: Go for it, in this price range it will beat it's competitors...
content: Overall i will give this product 4.2 out of 5.I have boat bassheads 225. I thought bass quality of boat airdopes 441 should be better than that but it's not even close. The bass is not very punchier,it gives a surrounding bass.If you don't want very punchy bass but excellent sound quality then this is for you.

name: Gulshan
title: Very nice product.
content: Very nice product, bass quality is very good, easy to use, proper fit in the ears, overall look is very nice.

name: PPS
title: Value for money
content: Sound quality is very nice,. Bass is up to mark, little loud, loudness shoud be controlled, in higher volume can't listen more then 2 songs.

name: Sugeetansh
title: Not the deal of the day for me ðŸ˜ž
content: The range of the ear buds is very short, it doesn't help when u make calls , I have asked for a refund of this product, as it doesn't fulfill my requirements, the voice clarity was not good enough , but ,when u keep phone in a close range , u can enjoy the music, but calls will still be flawed to some extent

name: Himanshu Dubey
title: Bad mic - painful to wear - decent music
content: They are pretty decent when it comes to just listening to music for a short while. The pairing process is quick and easy. But call quality is extremely poor. For prolonged usage, it gets extremely painful if your ears are small. It doesnâ€™t come with different sized buds.

name: Shaiju Janardhanan
title: Only to listen and not for talking
content: Its good for listening to music but when it comes to taking calls it fails miserably. The person on the other side can hardly listen to you and after about 10 mins into a call even the audio gets garbled. If possible i would return this and take one with a wire

name: Siddarth Srinivas
title: Disappointing!
content: Decent product, but has lot of bugs. After buying it for the first time, the right side plug stopped working and I had to get it replaced. For now it's working fine, don't know if I will have to repent later. Sound quality is fine for the price we pay, but I'm disappointed with the issues that the product has.

name: Navi Sekhon
title: BEST TILL DATE
content: Personally i am more than satisfied from these airdopes. The sound quality with heavy bass is par excellence. Battery backup is more than enough. Highly recommended.

name: Kanishk Goyal
title: It itch in ear and voice keep on breaking
content: Good quality of sound but it is useless if your voice keeps breaking. I bought these on 6 Aug and got it delivered on 13 Aug and I started facing problem after 13 days of use. I can't return these. They are bad.

name: ABC
title: Worth of money
content: sound quality awesome.. But buttons are too active will easily pause a video even if you are attempting to adjust the phones.. Microphone is available in only right earbud.. If right is lost left ear bud will not work or connect to Bluetooth.. Call quality can be improved currently reasonable

name: Shailesh b.
title: Quality issue: Right ear pod not charging/ working after 15 days
content: I have used this product for the last 15 days during my workouts, Connectivity was good ,no lag or drop in music,Sound quality was good however bass level could have been better. One major issue the right ear pod is not charging and not working. Warrenty proceedings have been initiated hope i will get a replacement

name: Kunal Roy
title: Nice
content: Every thing is nice sounds quality is also good. Only the problem is that after using it for hours your ears starts hurting

name: Arindam
title: Best earphones under 3k
content: Perfectly fine. Value for money.. Sound quality is very good and noise cancellation too. Touch works fine. Battery backup is also good. Very light weight and easy to handle..

name: Monali
title: Good one but need some improvement
content: Am writing this review after using for 5 days . Initially it work better and after 5 days one earpod(left) is having more sound and other one (right)slightly less. Boad need to fix this issue other wise sound quality is very good. Also battaery is sufficient for full day use

name: saurabh singh
title: Poor product, disconnecting frequently and low battery issue
content: this product is not good at this price point the right earbud is regularly disconnecting and bluetooth range is not more than 3 mtr. Also battery is discharging very quickly. Sound quality is average. Gonna return this

name: Navin Raj
title: Good buy for the price
content: Good for those who want have a feel of using buds for starters, they do take a little time getting used to, but overall the quality in terms of packaging, product and sound delivery is good.

name: Vishesh Mankal
title: One earbud dead after only a month
content: One side stopped working after only a month of light usage. On top of that, there's a slight delay in transmission while watching movies and such, which throws the whole soundtrack out of sync. And then there's no direct way of knowing how much battery is left. Not recommended.

name: Mradul Pratap Singh
title: Worst Voice Cancellation
content: Sound Quality and bass is good. But voice cancellation is very poor. While on call person on other side hears voice from all around except the person he is talking to. And you have to talk lauder so that the person on the other side could hear you. Except that it has good battery backup. It connects very smoothly.

name: AA
title: Above average product
content: Haven't used a lot.. 4 to 5 times in about 15 days.. Looks good, build quality is also good.. Light weight, clarity & sound is good. BT connects really fast but distance wise it's ok. Don't play games.... No time so no comments. Not good for long duration (30 to 40 min is fine) ears pain. Rating 3.5/5

name: Jay Pathak
title: Faulty
content: These airdopes stopped working after 2months I had to send it for repair and the worst part is it's been a month I've not received my replacement yet and the customer service is pathetic everytime you call you will get a same answer that it will arrive shortly.... won't order or use boat anymore

name: shivam
title: Boat 441 airdopes...  Best Bluetooth airdopes under 2k.
content: I like its compact size. Great sound quality with great bass. Only one small problem is thier and that is battery backup... Without box in one charge it gives me almost 4 to 5 hrs. And with box almost for 4 days. Everything is great calling is also good. But for gamers this is not for you.

name: Shashidhar
title: Connectivity Issues and significant audio lag
content: Strictly not suitable for gaming, the manufacturer did not provide any info on latency of audio. upon using for sometime the latency observed is almost 0.25s which is annoying and it doesnt have the low latency aptX tech...the device although is connected but theres no audio which we were unable to resolve...just amediocre device with overprice

name: Jibin Boby
title: China made
content: I bought Boat as it's an Indian company but this product is made in china(P.R.C = people republic of China) so think before buying .

name: MAYUR MADDYðŸ§
title: Good product for Bass lovers but other features r not that good
content: I would bifurcate it in two parts. Good Thing-. * the bass quality is good. *Look's very stylish. * Fit in ear even if you workout. Not GOOD @-. * Call quality is not good, need to speak loudly. * Some times one of ear bud doesn't work. * Battery life is not good (i mean it last upto 2hrs max if u were on call/ listening music)

name: Reema Aswani
title: The perfect music partner in this price
content: Pros:. Great Bass. Best Battery life. Perfect touch controls (Volume can't be controlled through the buds). Very lightweight and excellent grip. Cons:. Not good for calling. Day to day calls are fine but pathetic on a busy road or while driving.. So if u want TWS for music, it's a perfect buy. But big no for calling.

name: Amazon Customer
title: overall rewieve
content: the sound quality of this product is to good !!. comfort - 7/ 10. cant keep in ear for more than 2 hour .. bass - 9 /10. touch controls - 8 / 10. sound is very clear !!. mic also works good !!. overall a nice package !!. you can go for this product !!. they also look so cool !!. worth for this price range !!

name: Ricky
title: Amazing
content: Bass is amazing. When volume is at 100% then bass is one of the best quality for this price. Sound quality is also amazing but the noise cancellation can do with some work.but for this price point, the quality is awesome. For people who want a high quality budget earphones, this product is a no brainer

name: Radhika
title: Loot!!
content: Product is good but it's nanufactured in China. And label says made in P.R.C.. These companies are trying to deceive customers.. Trying not to buy China made stuff!! Hence going for just 3 star for this.

name: Karthik Sankar
title: Frequent disconnection and interuption
content: Got this airdopes replaced twice (thanks to Amazon's service). But there is frequent interuption in playback even when I turn my head left and right (forget jogging and using it in the gym). Even when you sit still - the left earpiece disconnects frequently. This was the case in both the airdopes pieces that I got.

name: Kishanraj PG
title: Buzzing sound from left earbud. Faulty product.
content: Please do not buy the product. There is a buzzing sound from the left earbuds. It doesn't stop. I can't even get a refund because there is no refund policy. I am replacing the item. I am afraid that i will get the faulty product again. ðŸ˜ž. PLEASE DONT BUY. Its the airdopes 441 pro.

name: Kartik Chandra Lenka
title: Not worth the price!
content: It is good for music but for calls its not too good.bass is nice,noise cancelation is good,but it is not too comfortable because of the ear flag.It is a beast in this price range.After 2 months the left earbud sound have become low and right ear is working fineðŸ˜”

name: Shalini p.
title: Not a fair experience
content: I just gifted this for my bro as he is a massive base lover..this airdopes is great for bass but the drawback is this airdopes suddenly disconnects and be monoplay...it's average for calling..,below the expected level..not worth for money!!!

name: Customer
title: Good for hearing songs not for calls
content: I've compared many tws earbuds and I can tell u the sound quality of this one is really good,but this is not for people who uses tws for calls, mic quality is really poor

name: Ravi B N
title: Static noise
content: -There is a light static sound heard when we put it on , it goes after 5 seconds.. -Can hear distorted noise after 15 mins of usage.

name: Vishrut
title: VALUE FOR MONEY !!
content: 1. Saound quality is great. 2. Good for gaming footsteps are clear. 3. If you are a bass lover you should buy it 4. Noise cancellation is excellent. 5. Battery backup is also good I charged the case 4 days before and it's still full charged even I have used it a lot of times.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad Call Quality
content: I regret buying it. The call quality is too bad. The other person hardly hears you out. Too bad experience with Amazon. If I can replace this with Noise or something.

name: Sukumar
title: Not so much impressed... it's OK!
content: Not as I expected... Overall sound quality is OK but bass is not tight and feel like spreading bass. And what are functions given in user manul are not matching with the earphones and totally different.

name: Venkat
title: Good looking and pretty decent sound for the price
content: Connects to phone's bluetooth seamlessly. I use it every morning during jogging. It's very comfortable to wear and has a decent sound quality. Microphone is good in quiet places, but I have not yet used it in noisy environment.

name: Kumar Amit
title: Cute Earpod
content: Earphone is good, sound quality is good but bass quality is ok. Its take 2 to 3 days for use to with this earpod with its touch screen otherwise backup is very good. Overall experience is nice with this earpods. Can go for this earpods easily.

name: Nikitha
title: Very Disappointed: Not sure whether its original product or Boat quality is bad
content: Within 10 days of using the product, one of the airdopes, keeps disconnecting from the pair. Unfortunately replacement time has elapsed, hence waiting to repair under warranty.. But really disappointed, as i expected to have a good experience considering the brand and the cost.

name: Chandrahas Singh Rajput
title: Best in class
content: Sound quality: Best. Bass: Superb. Connectivity: good. Battery life: 6-7 hrs in one go. 2-3 days with case.. Comfortable in ear...

name: Rajan Rathi
title: Amazing sound quality and noise cancellation
content: Sound quality is great. Noise cancellation is perfect. Bass quality is good. Battery back up is also great. Comfortable to wear. Just 1 issue is you might feel little harshness if you use it for longer period like an hour. i bought it for 2499 and next day price dropped to 1999. :(

name: Kaniyan Poongundran
title: Worth buying for 1699/- Flash sale.
content: Worth buying for 1699/- Flash sale. Used for 15 days, bang for the buck. Not recommended to hear volume at 100%[Some white noise]. 80-85 % volume sound is clear.

name: RAJAT
title: Horrible. Not reliable product at all.
content: Horrible. Stopped working after 5 days from purchase. Not a reliable product.. Even Sound quality is not a pleasant. Battery Working time is very less than claimed.

name: Rajesh sharma
title: My opinion
content: It fit perfect in my ears.. The sound quality is fine ... But when you watch full movie for the 1st time with this aripods there wil be some pain in ears ..when you remove your headset .

name: Vijay
title: Not so good
content: not so good. What ur listening is also listened by other persons who are sitting besides you very easily.... bass are ok but volume à¤œà¥‹ bhar à¤œà¤¾à¤¤à¤¾ à¤¹à¥ˆ à¤¸à¤¬ à¤¸à¥à¤¨ à¤¸à¤•à¤¤à¥‡ h à¤•à¥‹à¤ˆ privacy nh h

name: Priyanka Pal
title: Good sound and build quality
content: Sound quality is good and build quality is also good in this range just my ear are small and sometimes looks too big for small ears and little difficult to fit

name: Vijay Y.
title: The calling voice clarity is not good
content: The product is good for general use but after a month of usage, I observed whenever I'm calling from an outside/road/crowded place the remote person can not hear my voice properly. This is not worthy as per the pricing even after some time your ear will feel a bit pain due to the fixing rubber cord.

name: Sunil Gupta
title: Ok product....
content: Nice product. I buyied this airpods for my online lecture. But I don't know why I was not able to use it prefectlyin my laptop in Google meet. Beside that everything was . I think it's been 2-3 month since I have started using this product. It is not very awesome. But it is usable......

name: Rishimali
title: Read my review carefully
content: The actual problem with these dopes is they fit in our ears fully not even air can pass through it. Which makes a little bit of uncomfortable experience.. The bass and treble are really awesome but the vocals are not really good.

name: Dhawal Moghe
title: Excellent product, but Right bud has lots of issues.
content: Right earbud has some issues since the first time I opened box, it connects and disconnects automatically. Again I have to put it in box and take it out same happens again and again.. Will check out for 3-4 days or else try to return the product.. Other than this issue, every thing else is A1, Excellent.

name: ASHISH
title: Good product
content: Good sound quality and noise cancellation for the price. However while speaking through microphone you may face challenges sometimes. Other party may not be able to hear clearly.

name: ravi
title: Disappointment ðŸ˜”
content: Bought this product due to its battery backup. But it is all false. I have got a replacement of this product and even after that I found that I was getting less than w hours of backup. As per the box it informs of giving 5 hrs of playback, so disappointed.

name: Shashank Gupta
title: Don't buy
content: Poor noise cancellation.. Worst part is it's non- returnable product.

name: Sai kiran
title: Not at all a worth to buy
content: Have bought the product with minimum expectations of utilising this for taking the calls.But it's a complete disaster.Noice cancellation is very bad.Not at all satisfied with the product.Its more a 500 rupees product rather than 2k.I would not suggest to buy this if someone wants to utilise for talking via these dopes.

name: Naveen Kumar
title: left earbud is not working
content: i gave 2rating because the left earpod is not working.. in dussera sale i brought 3 boat 441 earpods in my family.. out of 3 two are in same condition left earbud is not working.. i checked for exchange but there is no exchange option.. how can i contact ccare also i dont know

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money
content: The buds won't place properly on the charging pin with smaller fin attachment on. It needs to adjust at the correct level with the pin to set properly. Overall great value for money product, super punchy bass and vocals, rapid fast pairing and battery backup is superior at this price range. Highly recommended.

name: SIDHANT NAIK
title: Good Buy!!
content: I bought them 3 days back....still a while to go on testing.....but then untill now they have not disappointed except for the call quality...the person connected feels like speaker is turned on due to background rush heard on microphone.

name: Akash
title: Awesome product at affordable price.
content: Great product at the given price. Comfortable to wear. Strong bass. good for taking calls. Also both buds can be used for calling individually. Thus you never run out of power. Nice product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst product
content: Plz don't buy such a pathetic product.. After one week of use it's not working properly, even difficulties in pairing with phone. Poor quality in calling sometime call disconnect itself.. Customer service is also not responding.. Avoid to buy.

name: Ganesh.
title: Neck bands are much better than TWS
content: Sound quality is good..but main problem is not fitting properly in to ear. After use of 30min giving pain to external ear muscles. For ease of use & comfort neck bands are much much better than TWS.

name: Sanjay sajwan
title: Left earbuds not working
content: From the 4 days when i buy this product its working very good and sould quality is also awesome. But unfortunately my left earbud working totally stop, i also reset the factory reset but only right airbud are reset and left still stop totally. I dont have any return option. So what can i do rigjt now????

name: Ritesh Lamba
title: Best product at this price
content: At the price range, this is the best product available in the market. The bass is better than most of the high priced competitors, though clarity is just about average. Minus one ðŸŒŸ because I received a used product with some amount of wax in one of the ear piece.

name: Daya Shetty
title: Flop indian product
content: After 2 days right side of ear bud is stoped working totally flop don't buy. How can any buddy believe in indian product then this is the quality

name: Akhil a.
title: I highly recommend people to not buy these eardopes
content: The left ear bud produces some kind of a continuous whirring sound that is very irritating. I thought that my unit is faulty and got it replaced by amazon which turned out to be a big waste of time as the replacement sounds worse than the first one and more whirring sound.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Calling is worst on these
content: After talking on this for 15-20 minutes, left side is getting disconnected and other person is unable to listen my voice

name: Ambuj Khanna
title: Average product
content: I find them average. Bass sound is not as per my expectations. You cannot use it for long time. It start hurting in ear.

name: Yousuf
title: Excellent quality bluetooth  truly wireless earphones!
content: Bass is just outstanding! Touch response is also awesome. Fits perfectly inside the ears and doesn't move. The case is not bulky when kept inside the pocket. Superb finish and looks cool. On the whole, excellent quality bluetooth truly wireless earphones at this cost.

name: Guddu
title: Not up to expectations
content: Not happy with the product sound in the left peace goes off erratically. Sometimes it works for 5 to 10 minutes. And sometimes not. then goes off wants to replace it as the product is in warranty period

name: bhavin
title: Quite good
content: All things are good in it but only one cons is there, it's not that much comfortable, you can't wear it for long time. It's hurting in your ear.

name: Aditya Baranwal
title: Comfort
content: The sound quality is good. Bass and ups and lows of music are good in the airdopes. But they are not at all comfortable for ears(subjective to user's view, I didn't find it comfortable at all). Also the airdopes keep falling from ear, so I won't recommend it for runners or gym person.

name: amazon reader
title: Not really worth the investment
content: Not so impressive......right ear pod is not working. Its just 10 days since I bought them and return window is already closed.

name: Saurabh chaudhary
title: Don't buy this
content: It's so heartening that boat isn't giving quality in their products.. I hardly used my product for 5 to 7 times.. And yet it has no sound in left earbud.. Even they're new!!. I don't expect this from boat.. Btw that's why indian made products don't get their boom in market... Trust is everything bud ðŸŒ±

name: pahur dahra
title: Nice product
content: Awesome bass... Nice battery backup...lasts long. Very Comfortable. Light weight. Catchy LED lights. Nice touch feature. Quick connectivity. Good call quality...not the best..sound attenuates(sound loss) a bit. Overall the product is very good at this price

name: Ayush Subramaniam
title: Pros and cons
content: This is a very good earphones with a good sound and bass. The connectivity is also really quick. There is only one issue with this airdopes, that whenever you are on call the listener can hear your background voice more clearly than yours. I just hoped the battery life was more than 3 hrs. Overall this product is really good.

name: AKSHAY V NAIR
title: JUST ONE WORD TO DEFINE IT -AWESOME
content: Its one of the amazing products which has been recently launched my Boat. Kudos to you guys to deliver such an amazing product at this price range. The bass, sound quality and the noise cancellation works amazing. Overall I am really happy with it. You open its charging box and VOILA it just takes us to the next level of entertainment of music.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good for gym music movies
content: Best TWS in the market in this price range.

name: Mayank Tiwari
title: Avg earbuds.
content: Good for audio and video but sometimes one bud stops working and on adjusting it connects again.. Battery backup is poor since it can work only for 3-4 hrs then you need to charge it again.. Not good for voice calls.. Spend little more and buy a good pair of buds if you want it for seamless voice calls.

name: Vivek S
title: Left earbud stopped working
content: Left ear bud stopped working & we are unable to do factory reset for left ear bud. Unfortunately the returns date expired on 5th September & we started facing this problem on 6th September (today). Will never go for Chinese products in future.

name: Jyoti Ghosh
title: Defective product received
content: Products had a problem from the very first day. Left the left earbud started giving trouble. The left sometimes work sometimes doesnâ€™t. Also, the back was not up to the mark. Itâ€™s supposed to give me a back up of 5hrs but it lasted for only lest than 2 hours. Hence, had to return it and ask for a replacement.

name: vrushal naik
title: Good product from boats loved it!!
content: Amazing product available out there...!!. Best sound quality and battery at an affordable price would definitely recommend this... The case is small and compact. Glitchfree operations.. Everything is excellent.. Just due to rubber ear experience a small pain but other rubber solves the problem

name: Amazon Customer
title: Amezing deal

name: MD BELAL
title: Pubg mobile Review
content: If you are buying this item specially pubg so plz don't because sound may came after 2-3 dealy so don't buy for pubg!. And also a good airdobs sound bass but Price is too high I think prize range 999-1499 !!

name: Amazon Customer

name: Snehal V.

name: ankit gosai

name: Me. X

name: RAHUL
title: Sensitive touch issue

name: Vikas

name: Jagadeesh
title: Amazing fitttt loved it...â¤ï¸
content: Sound quality is osm...fit is superb... value for money...best buds in the market....good standby..overall loved but this is my second one actually the first one which I got worked great for 4 days but after it didn't work....so I got replacement...got the second one...let's see this time.... product is up to the mark....

name: KP

name: Aneesh

content: Product is good but not suitable for my ears . The buds make real pain in my ear due to the shape (probably). Good battery back up too..

name: Sohail Mohammed

name: Fuzail Shafi

So if anybody wants suggestion about this very product, the product is awesome but for music listners or video etc. But for gamers i will not vouch for this very product...

name: Zubair
title: Speakers no more working
content: All of sudden, my Airpodes are not working.... -->I'm able to connect to mobile.. --> My speaks are no more audible, can't hear the voice /music.... --> I bought it 2weeks back... Feeling very bad... Lost my money... Is there any exchange available now ?

name: AbCd

content: The box is poorly designed .. very difficult to open. Not only that, it's difficult to take out the buds. Good for voice.

name: Leela vasanth

title: Product is defective

name: Ruatfela c.

name: Amazon Customer
